transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yeah, good afternoon ma'am. Saurav this side from IndiaMART.
Customer: Yeah, sir, this is sir.
Executive: Uh, ma'am, sir, regarding the discussion we had in the morning from company. Sir, I could not understand what sir.
Executive: Yeah, it is come, you will be, do you comfortable in English, ma'am?
Customer: Sir, Tamil no sir, unga Tamil.
Executive: Hello. Ha, do you know Tamil?
Executive: No, no, no Tamil. Is it possible to speak communicate in English, ma'am?
Customer: Okay, sir.
Executive: Yeah, now actually in the morning we had a discuss na regarding you major concern to move your company to Chennai location from head office to Chennai.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Yeah, so regarding the same I am calling you that I already raised a concern for the same. Maintenance development timing be that we will do your work but actually it needs seven to eight days of time, ma'am.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay. Seven to eight days ah?
Executive: Yeah, yeah, yeah.
Customer: Ha, ha, okay.
Executive: Okay, na? Means we need seven to eight days of time to transfer your company from head office to field, ma'am.
Customer: Hmm, okay.
Executive: Okay, na? After that we can transfer your company.
Customer: Okay, sir.
Executive: Okay, and I just also want to know that you put a mail regarding the same, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay, you put the mail for the same regarding the same first. Please what? Regarding for what?
Executive: No, no, actually you mail us na that we want to move our company from head office to Chennai location. So I'm acknowledging your concern, we need seven to eight days of time. So can we close the concern now?
Customer: You please give, give one close the concern. You please mention we can close me. Uh, it will, it will take seven to eight days. It will transfer to your account manager in Chennai. The person name and all you please mention those details now.
Executive: So actually once we will transfer your account from head office to Chennai office na, location na. Uh, you have to give a mail no sir. You have to give a mail for this. Uh, we are to.
Executive: Ma'am, definitely I will put a mail for the same. But regarding the same you can also connect with your account manager Mr. Rakesh Kumar also. I'm not telling that I will not put your mail but it will take seven to eight days of time. After that your company will be moved. Actually we will see that which location is near our office to your office and which personnel is available to take under your account.
Customer: Ha, sir, you you're telling all these things over this phone no sir. You please text all these things and send me a mail because I am also reporting to my management sir. I if you send me that closing notification means they are expected me to rise again. You please write the ticket and all they told sir. So please give me proper mail. I will send forward this to my team sir.
Customer: Okay, they after that they confirm. They okay through this with proper mail confirmation is required.
Customer: Please send me a mail sir. What and all you were telling to telling over the phone, you please text and text me.
Customer: Otherwise they are rising again they expected us to rise the uh queries. Not me if if I am not available you know na kuda they are expected other staff to rise the queries. So ha. So the communication was difficult so they are rising. You please give me mail so the mail will be readed by the all the staff employee and employer they are reading. They will understand the mail.
Executive: No, I do understand na. Definitely I will just send to you and we will get back to you again. Actually just we got update that it take a seven to eight days of time. So I I was thinking that surely I will call you. So you can also understand that I need a time but you will get the confirmation from our end also.
Customer: Ha, yeah, my yeah, yeah, my management if if means you send me a mail that closing your concern is closing means mail comes through that management will see oh okay again rise me query.
Customer: Those and all they told.
Executive: I understand. After after that I will put on mail to you, ma'am. I'm ha, okay.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Customer: Thank you. Ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a mail with all details discussed.

- Management expects a proper mail for confirmation.



Resolution:

- Executive informed it will take 7-8 days.

- Executive assured to send a mail.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- company location, mail, confirmation
